item.title: Report X-2025021075
item.description:
Report X-2025021075

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-18
  • City: HILLSBORO
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS NEAR SCENE WHEN IT OCCURED. RESPONDER WAS NOTIFIED VIA WORD OF MOUTH BY ANOTHER EMPLOYEE THAT THERE WAS A LEAKER. RESPONDER IMMEDIATELY GRABBED NEAR BY SPILL CART, SUITED UP AND CLEANED UP MESS.

item.title: Report X-2025021121
item.description:
Report X-2025021121

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-26T06:20:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-13
  • City: HILLSBORO
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT DOWN FROM DEBAG WITH SEVERAL OTHER PACKAGES. ALL HAD BEEN LEAKED ON BY SPAGHETTI SAUCE. DURING REWRAP RESPONDER NOTICED THE AMOUNT OF CELL PHONES IN THE BOX. THEN CHECKED THE OUTSIDE OF THE BOX FOR THE 3481 LITHIUM BATTERY LABEL. REWRAP; PACKAGE WAS LEAKED ON BY ANOTHER PACKAGE IN THE SORT; NO DAMAGE
